snippet: Mr. Huber spent nearly three decades with Turner Broadcasting, and won an Emmy for his essay on the bombing at the 1996 Olympic Games in Atlanta.
abstract: Jim Huber, Emmy-winning sports broadcaster and essayist, dies at age 67.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Huber spent nearly three decades with Turner Broadcasting, and won an Emmy for his essay on the bombing at the 1996 Olympic Games in Atlanta.

headline.seo: Jim Huber, Sports Broadcaster and Essayist, Is Dead at 67

headline.print_headline: Jim Huber, 67, Sports Broadcaster and Essayist
